bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Organizational review and updates to the current system and services
acquisition policy and procedures at an organization-defined frequency

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Organizational processes to determine information security requirements
for the information system or information system service in
mission/business process planning are outside the scope of
OpenShift configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Organizational processes to determine, document, and allocate the
resources required to protect the information system or information
system service as part of its capital planning and investment
control process are outside the scope of
OpenShift configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Organizational processes to establish a discrete line item for
information security in organizational programming and budgeting
documentation are outside the scope of OpenShift configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Organizational processes to manage the information system using
organization-defined system development life cycle that incorporates
information security considerations are outside the scope
of OpenShift configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Organizational processes to define and document information security
roles and responsibilities throughout the system development
life cycle are outside the scope of OpenShift configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Organizational processes to identify individuals having information
security roles and responsibilities are outside the scope of
OpenShift configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Organizational processes to integrate the organizational information
security risk management process into system development life cycle
activities are outside the scope of OpenShift configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:

configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:

configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Organizational processes to include security assurance requirements
in acquisition contracts are outside the scope of
OpenShift configuration.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Obtaining administrator documentation is an organizational procedure.
To facilitate a response, links to Red Hat OpenShift documentation
are provided below.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
A guide to securing Red Hat OpenShift can be downloaded from:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/5059881

Installation:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/latest/installing/index.html

Compliance:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/latest/security/compliance_operator/compliance-operator-installation.html

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
The Guide to securing Red Hat OpenShift touches on effective use
of security mechanisms:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/5059881

Red Hat OpenShift documentation has chapters on SCCs:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/latest/authentication/managing-security-context-constraints.html
on hardening RHCOS:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/latest/security/container_security/security-hardening.html
or securing the container platform:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/latest/security/container_security/security-platform.html

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Official Red Hat CVE findings can be found at:
https://access.redhat.com/security/security-updates/#/cve

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
The following chapter provides an overview of container security
functions:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/latest/security/container_security/security-understanding.html
as well as Chapter 3 (Container Security) of the OpenShift
security guide.

bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.description: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.
bdba9d56-2be4-498d-8d31-b43cab6a44bd.remarks:
Since users of Red Hat OpenShift are primarily developers, developer-centric
documentation applies here.
The following chapters provides an overview of securing the container content
and the build process:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.7/security/container_security/security-container-content.html
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.7/security/container_security/security-build.html
